pages.title: Kamen Rider Sigurd
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver_sigurd)Genesis Driver (Sigurd)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Genesis Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Fire Resistance$(li)Strength II

pages.title: Kamen Rider Sigurd
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Battle: Ganbarizing (2013, arcade game)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver_sigurd)Genesis Driver (Sigurd)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Armored Rider$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Resistance$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength
